author: B. L. van der Waerden
summary: Van der Waerden invites von Neumann to give a lecture at the joint colloquium of the University and E.T.H. Zurich in late October, after the Amsterdam Congress. He offers 300 Swiss francs for travel expenses and mentions that Finsler, Nevanlinna, and colleagues from E.T.H. would be pleased if he accepts.
title: Invitation to Lecture in Zurich
